page.title: 21Established businesses in Fair Oak
page.content:
W.J.Aburrow suppliers of fresh Spit-Roasted Chicken to the catering trade since 1960 celebrating 50 years in business from the same address at Witt Road Fair which before William Aburrow started the business was a poultry packing station run by A.J. Passingham.

The Business now called Burgundy Catering By W.J.Aburrow is now owned and run by Antony J Aburrow who continues to supply the Spit Roasted chicken but also provides

Fresh cold Buffet Catering from 10-100 people.
Antony Aburrow
Contribution by: Mr Antony Aburrow born 22/09/1960 at witt road fair son of William & Eileen Aburrow.
